channel.title: Anyone feeling nice?
channel.description:
I need anyone to send like 1cent to my paypal so I can test it cuz I am a little confused and I just made paypal for the first time. I have never done anything with money over the net so I wanna see how this works.
You don't have to set up a bank acc right?
You don't have to have credit card details right ?
Anyway if you would be awesome enough to send me 1c or something just to test I would be so grateful. And if you want I can send it back :P
Do you just need to know my email to do this ? If so its javaownzu@hotmail.com
Thanks :)

item.title: Anyone feeling nice?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

I–own–i, you can recieve all the money you want to your paypal, but in order to be able to buy stuff/purchase things you must verify your paypal, in wich a bank account is needed… and a credit card after that to extend your smending limit.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone feeling nice?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

If you send 1cent to someone, they won’t receive anything because it takes 1cent fee off the payment automatically. The fee varies with the amount of money I think, not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone feeling nice?
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Dutch paypal does let you send money unverified. It also has a higher send/recieve limit then most of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone feeling nice?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

xxlegitxx:

I believe US Paypal doesn’t let you send money without it verified.

Same with the UK version, I had the equivilent of $100 sent to me so I didn’t need to bother my mum whenever I wanted to buy something, and had to try and verify my card(you CAN send money while you have a card pending, that’s how I sent it back) but they blocked my account because there a bunch of assholes.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone feeling nice?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

dragonus18:

maybe she should of learned about the whole conversion/worth of our money in other countries and their money in ours? tbh its your mom’s fault for being ignorant.

From your posts, I’ve gathered that you’re a prick.

Read full topic

Anyway if you would be awesome enough to send me 1c or something just to test I would be so grateful. And if you want I can send it back

Thanks :)[/quote]
Paypal does that automaticly when you sign up to verify your account.
